CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT talks to the INV who is out in the hall . CHI is sitting on the floor in center of room and MOT is at boxes on table in the corner of room
MOT sits down on the floor next to CHI
MOT lays box on floor in front of CHI
MOT looks at book in box
MOT pushes empty box to the side
MOT slides over closer to CHI
MOT holds book between her and CHI and points to cover
MOT circles picture on cover with her finger
CHI glances up toward camera and nods her head . CHI looks at book
MOT points to picture . <aft> looks at CHI
CHI grabs her foot and stretches out her leg
MOT circles picture on book cover with her finger
CHI is looking at book on MOT's knee
MOT starts to read book to CHI
<3> MOT points to picture several times
CHI looks at picture and nods
MOT looks at CHI as she points to picture
MOT starts to point to picture
CHI raises her arm and points to page while shaking her head
MOT circles picture with her finger
CHI points to another picture on the page
MOT points to the other picture
MOT starts to point to picture
CHI leans over MOT's hand and points to another picture at the top of the page
MOT points to picture and looks at CHI
MOT points to picture again and looks down at CHI
MOT points to the picture again
MOT circles picture with her finger then glances down at CHI
CHI lifts her foot up to her mouth
MOT nods her head then looks at CHI
MOT leans down and looks into CHI's face
CHI looks to corner of room and points to boxes there
MOT points with index finger to indicate one minute
CHI is fidgeting with her foot in her hands and nods affirmatively
MOT starts to turn page forward but then turns back to previous page
MOT starts to point to picture
MOT starts to point to picture
CHI leans over and points to picture
CHI is looking at book and fidgeting with foot clasped in her hands
CHI stares at book for a few seconds then leans over and points to picture
MOT points to and looks at pictures
<aft> CHI slaps her hand on her knee several times
CHI slaps her hands on her legs
MOT circles picture with her finger
MOT makes a big circle over the page with her finger
MOT starts to point to picture
CHI looks where MOT is pointing
MOT takes cover and puts it on box
MOT stands up and walks over to boxes
MOT walks back over to CHI
MOT lays box on floor in front of CHI
MOT helps CHI lift cover off and lay it on floor
CHI picks up Cookie_Monster puppet and shakes it
<aft> CHI lays the puppet on the floor beside her and takes bird puppet out of box and looks at it
CHI flips puppet back and forth from one hand to the other and pats it
MOT picks up Cookie Monster puppet and lays the open end out to CHI
CHI lays bird puppet on top of Cookie Monster puppet
MOT slips bird puppet onto her hand
CHI watches MOT and nods affirmatively
CHI picks up Cookie Monster and slips in onto her hand
MOT holds up puppet and opens and closes its mouth
MOT has her puppet nibble at CHI's puppet
MOT holds bird puppet up and moves its mouth
MOT opens and closes her puppet's mouth
MOT holds up puppet and moves its mouth
CHI looks down at puppet on her hand
MOT taps puppet on CHI's hand
<bef> CHI slips puppet off of her hand and into box
MOT takes puppet off of her hand
MOT puts cover on box and then lays it aside
CHI points to box as she watches MOT walks away
MOT walks back to CHI and sets another box down in front of CHI
CHI lifts cover off of box
MOT takes cover from CHI and lays it on floor
CHI takes paper out of box
MOT starts to pick up crayons out of box
MOT slides box out of the way and lays crayons in front of CHI
MOT turns empty box upside down in front of CHI and lays paper on it
MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI lays down one crayon and picks up another then draws
<aft> CHI lays down crayon and picks up another one
CHI lays down crayon and then hands drawing to MOT
CHI looks at paper then at MOT
CHI looks around then at paper
CHI fidgets on the floor and looks up and points to boxes in corner of room
MOT glances over in direction of boxes and points
CHI looks up at MOT and points to drawing
CHI points to spot on the drawing
CHI looks at crayon in her hand
CHI stops drawing and claps her hands
CHI puts down crayon and picks up another one then draws with that one
<bef> CHI puts her crayon on the floor . CHI stretches forward on her hands and points to boxes in corner of room
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT glances over at the boxes
MOT starts to put crayons and paper back into box
<aft> MOT puts cover on box and lays it aside
MOT stands up and walks over to boxes
MOT lays box down on floor in front of CHI
CHI leans forward to peer into box
MOT helps CHI to lift flaps of box so she can peer inside
CHI tries to pull house out of box
<aft> MOT slides over on the floor behind CHI
CHI slides house out of box
CHI picks up other box and drops it down behind her
MOT leans behind CHI and pushes the other box to the side further away from them
CHI looks into interior of house
MOT looks into house and then at CHI
CHI takes a bed out of the house
CHI takes a doll and lays it in the bed and then places them in the house
CHI continues to place toys in house
CHI reaches for the door and tries to open it
MOT leans over and looks inside garage
cannot see what MOT and the child are looking at
CHI takes car out of garage
CHI looks at house . <2-3> CHI points to objects inside of it
CHI leans back on her knees and stares at garage
MOT taps garage with her finger
<$=1> CHI leans over and takes dolls out of house
CHI starts to put dolls in car
CHI pushes car full of dolls across the floor
MOT slides closer to the wall to get out of CHI's way
CHI places car on floor and crawls back to the house
CHI picks up another doll from out of the house and examines it then places it in another room
CHI takes another toy out of the house and looks at it
MOT is sitting behind CHI and watching her play
CHI gazes around and looks inside it
CHI takes another doll out of the house
CHI shows the doll to MOT
CHI crawls over to the car full of dolls and then crawls back to house
CHI slightly out of camera view momentarily
CHI starts to play with objects inside of house
CHI picks up toy and moves between house and other pile of toy people
CHI reaches for car full of dolls and brings them over to house then takes pieces of furniture out of the house and put dolls on them
MOT is sitting behind CHI watching her play
CHI picks up a doll from off of the floor and places it on furniture
CHI looks at doll in her hand
CHI leans closer to house and looks inside
CHI reaches into house then pulls out bed and toy doll
CHI puts one toy bed down next to the house
CHI takes a doll and places in front of the house
<bef> CHI sits back and looks at dolls on floor . CHI claps
CHI starts to lift up garage door
<aft> CHI picks up car and puts it in garage
CHI begins to play with Crayons and Paper and Puppets again
CHI looks up at boxes in corner of room
MOT looks over at boxes lying next to her on the floor
<1-4> CHI points to one of the boxes lying on the floor
CHI stands up and walks over to box <5-6> CHI points to box on floor
CHI picks up box of Crayons and Paper
CHI lifts cover off of box
CHI takes a piece of paper and a crayon out of the box
CHI stands up and hands paper to MOT
<bef> CHI makes a circular figure with her hands then sits on the floor
CHI stretches her leg out in front of MOT
CHI takes a piece of paper out of the box
CHI points with paper in hand to box out of camera view
MOT turns empty box over in front of CHI and taps the top
<4> CHI lays her paper on top of box
<aft> MOT lays her piece of paper on the floor
MOT looks down at her hands
MOT lays her hands palms up in front of CHI
<5> MOT picks up crayon from the floor
CHI takes crayon from MOT then bends over box and draws for a few moments
CHI lays down crayon and picks another one up from the floor . CHI resumes drawing
CHI looks at paper and continues to draw
<aft> CHI puts down crayons and picks another one up from the floor and resumes drawing
CHI stops drawing and hands picture to MOT
<bef> MOT looks at paper . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then down at box then at MOT
MOT looks at the paper in her hand the looks at CHI
CHI stands up and walks over to boxes on floor
MOT drops paper to the floor
CHI picks up box of Puppets
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI nods and looks at MOT
MOT starts to put crayons and paper back into box
CHI stands holding box as MOT picks up crayons and paper
CHI walks closer to MOT then sits down on floor and lays box in front of her
CHI and MOT are off camera
CHI lifts cover off of box
CHI slips bird puppet onto her hand
CHI starts to slips Cookie Monster puppet onto other hand
CHI looks up at MOT and over to door of room
CHI looks at puppets on her hand
